title: BUY A MOOTS GRAVEL BIKE, GET A 2ND SET OF WHEELS FOR FREE!
content:
FREE SECOND SET OF WHEELS!

You read that correct. From now until June 30th you’ll receive a 2nd set of wheels with your Routt 45 or Routt YBB purchase for FREE! Turn one of the most versatile bikes into an even more capable set up with a second set of wheels. Mount up a set of small slicks to compliment your large knobbies to hit the pavement or mount up a less aggressive tire when route conditions call for it. From now until June 30th you can be rolling on a second set of wheels from Moots for FREE! The Astral Wanderlust wheel set is built with White Industries CLD hubs and built for road, gravel and cyclocross use. The “goldilocks” of rims with and internal width of 22mm. ($1,199.00 value)

Visit your local Moots Dealer or contact us at: info@moots.com or call: 970-879-1676.

 

Fine print:

Applies to new orders only. Can be redeemed with any of our “IN STOCK BIKES” (Routt 45 & Routt YBB only). Wheel set only. Offer runs from May 18th to June 30th 2023.

The post BUY A MOOTS GRAVEL BIKE, GET A 2ND SET OF WHEELS FOR FREE! appeared first on Moots Cycles.
author: Jon Cariveau
